name: Dangerous Data Gathering
desc: To ensure the data collector's successful lift-off, the Assembly Modules on all three paths must be pushed to their designated locations, <color=#FFE14BFF>generating a Strong Unipolar Field oriented toward the collector</color>.

imgDesc.text:
To ensure the data collector's successful lift-off, the Assembly Modules on all three paths must be pushed to their designated locations,
generating a Strong Unipolar Field oriented toward the collector.

When in an empowered state, characters can direct their power toward red or blue Unipolar Assembly Modules, thereby causing them to move. When the
same color as Assembly Modules, this power will manifest as
repulsion and push them away, but when a
different color, it will act as
attraction and pull them in.
When the assembly module is moved to a specific location, it can be interacted with, causing it to rotate.
Robots will make you aware of the current state of progress regarding preparations. Interact with them to reset the locations of assembly modules.
